/* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/anchor-has-content */ /* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/anchor-is-valid */ import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './index.css'; export default class Header extends Component { state = { header:false, search:false, rightnav:false, } myref = React.createRef(); componentDidMount() { window.addEventListener('scroll', this.handleScroll); this.handleScroll(); } handleScroll=()=> { const data = document.documentElement.scrollTop||document.body.scrollTop; if(data>=78){ this.setState({header:true,search:true}) } else { this.setState({header:false,search:false}) } console.log(data); } render() { const {header,search} = this.state return(
